response.overview: Legend Has It is set in a perfect Celtic society that has been built on tradition, honor and honesty. This story centers on the life of our protagonist, Bronwyn, who is preparing for a coming of age ceremony like no other. We follow her journey as she struggles with admitting what she knows; which could not only tarnish her family reputation, but her entire community’s. She battles with facing the consequences and the pressures of the truth.
response.title: Legend Has It

release_dates.note: Flying Broom International Women’s Film Festival
